vocabURI="http://lod.data-archive.ac.uk/skoshasset/c7ef1ece-a170-42e6-80fc-86889073f6e7">USA</keyword>         <topcClas>Trade, industry and markets - Industry and management</topcClas>       </subject>       <abstract><p>Abstract copyright UK Data Service and data collection copyright owner.</p>The Monthly Statistics of International Trade database provides monthly data from 1961 on imports and exports of goods by partner countries, trade in value classified by sections of SITC, volume indices, average unit value indices and price indices including seasonally adjusted series as well as calculated indicators for OECD countries with over 300 different partner countries and groups of partner countries.<br> <br> These data were first provided by the UK Data Service in March 2015. The UK Data Service web site includes further information on the OECD Monthly Statistics of International Trade database, including a <a href="http://ukdataservice.ac.uk/use-data/guides/dataset/itrade-statistics.aspx" title="OECD Monthly Statistics of International Trade dataset user guide">dataset user guide</a> and details of <a href="http://dx.doi.org/10.5257/oecd/itrade/2013" title="OECD Monthly Statistics of International Trade latest database updates">latest database updates</a>.<br> <br> Citation: The bibliographic citation for the database is: Organisation for Economic Cooperation and Development ({YYYY}): Monthly Statistics of International Trade database ({Edition: YYYY}). UK Data Service. DOI: {edition specific doi - e.g. <a href="http://dx.doi.org/10.5257/oecd/itrade/2014" title="dx.doi.org/10.5257/oecd/itrade/2014">http://dx.doi.org/10.5257/oecd/itrade/2014</a>}.  <br> <br> Alternative DOIs: <a href="http://dx.doi.org/10.1787/msit-data-en" title="10.1787/msit-data-en">/10.1787/msit-data-en</a>  (to access via OECD.Stat subscription).<br> </abstract>       <sumDscr>         <timePrd event="start" date="1961-01-01T00:00:00Z">1961</timePrd>         <timePrd event="end" date="2014-01-01T00:00:00Z">2014</timePrd>         <nation>Multi-nation</nation>         <geogUnit>Countries</geogUnit>         <universe>Cross-national; National</universe>         <universe>The countries covered are Australia, Austria, Belgium, Canada, Chile, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Israel, Italy, Japan, Korea, Luxembourg, Mexico, Netherlands, New Zealand, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Slovak Republic, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, Turkey, United Kingdom, and United States. See <a href="http://www.oecd.org/about/membersandpartners/list-oecd-member-countries.htm" title="full list of OECD members and partners">full list of OECD members and partners</a>.</universe>       </sumDscr>     </stdyInfo>     <method>       <dataColl>         <timeMeth>Time Series</timeMeth>         <sampProc>See documentation for details.</sampProc>         <collMode>For details of methodology, please see the <a href="http://ukdataservice.ac.uk/use-data/guides/dataset/itrade-statistics.aspx" title="dataset user guide">dataset user guide</a>.</collMode>         <sources />         <ConOps>See documentation for details.</ConOps>         <weight>See documentation for details.</weight>       </dataColl>     </method>     <dataAccs>       <setAvail>         <accsPlac><a href=http://www.esds.ac.uk/international/access/dataset_overview.asp >ESDS International, Manchester Information and Associated Services </a></accsPlac>       </setAvail>       <useStmt>         <specPerm>Restricted access</specPerm>         <restrctn>Registration is required and standard conditions of use apply.
